title: cant start game
body: After locking a champion i cant start game. The client comes up and there is written "recconect" when i press it , it writes "game in progress" for like less than 1 second and than writes ro recconect and i cant start a game. it happend after update and now i have got banned for that. Can it be my PC's problem? Can u help me please?

replies.body:
Hmmmm if you're having all those problems with reconnecting but it *only* happens when the loading screen is trying to launch it could actually be related to firewalls or antivirus blocking the client from making the new connection to the game servers. Also, I'd go ahead and run through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure everything is still in order there as well.

Check those really quick and either disable or add exceptions for League and be sure to test it in a custom/practice game.
